data.description_html:
A brief flash engulfs your undead ally, and through its flesh you can see its skeleton. The skeleton glows a dusky red for a moment.

This spell functions like stone bones (Spell Compendium page 208), except that the subject creature's skeleton changes to iron. The creature gains a +6 natural armor bonus to AC.

Arcane Focus: A miniature skull made out of iron or steel.
data.name: Iron Bones
